reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 104/02: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF DISABLED PERSON PARKING PERMITS
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF DISABLED PERSON PARKING PERMITS
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.content: 1. Despite section 5 of Regulation 581 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a disabled person parking permit is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the term for which the permit was issued would expire on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 104/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Despite section 5 of Regulation 581 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990, the term of validity of a disabled person parking permit is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the term for which the permit was issued would expire on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 104/02, s. 1.
